sense.gloss: lowering, sinking, bringing down, letting down
sauce (esp. soy or mirin-based dipping sauce)
kanji radical enclosing the top-left corner of a character

x: しだれ桜・しだれざくら

sense.gloss: incontinence, soiling oneself, wetting one's pants
zigzag-shaped paper streamer often used to adorn Shinto-related objects
hornbeam (deciduous tree in the birch family)
to hang, to droop, to dangle, to sag, to lower, to pull down
to give (e.g. lesson, instruction, scolding) (to someone of lower status), to confer, to grant, to bestow
to drip, to ooze, to trickle, to drop
to excrete (urine, feces, etc.), to let out (a fart)

sdata.j: ↑雲↑↓くも↓が↑低↑↓ひく↓く↑垂↑↓しだ↓れ↑込↑↓ご↓めた。
まずは↑自↑↓みずか↓ら↑見本↑↓みほん↓を↑示↑↓しめ↓す。そういった↑率先↑↓そっせん↓↑垂範↑↓すいはん↓の↑気持↑↓きも↓ちがなければ↑誰↑↓だれ↓も↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑付↑↓つ↓いてこないよ。
sdata.e: You have to think of the example you're setting. You'll never be able to lead if you don't set an example worth following.

sdata.j: ヘリコプターは↑垂直↑↓すいちょく↓に↑離陸↑↓りりく↓し、↑着陸↑↓ちゃくりく↓することができる。
sdata.e: A helicopter is able to take off and land straight up and down.

sdata.j: その↑柱↑↓はしら↓は↑垂直↑↓すいちょく↓になっていない。
sdata.e: That pole is not quite vertical.

sdata.j: その↑崖↑↓がけ↓はほとんど↑垂直↑↓すいちょく↓です。
↑厳密↑↓げんみつ↓に↑言↑↓い↓えば、それは↑垂直↑↓すいちょく↓↑線↑↓せん↓ではなかった。
sdata.e: Strictly speaking, it was not a vertical line.

sdata.j: ↑黒雲↑↓くろくも↓が↑垂↑↓た↓れ↑込↑↓こ↓めていた。
sdata.e: Dark clouds were brooding over the city.

sdata.j: ↑川岸↑↓かわぎし↓で↑数↑↓すう↓↑人↑↓にん↓の↑男↑↓おとこ↓が↑糸↑↓いと↓を↑垂↑↓しだ↓れている。
sdata.e: Several men are fishing from the riverbank.

sdata.j: ↑雨垂↑↓あまだ↓れ↑石↑↓いし↓を↑穿↑↓うが↓つ。
sdata.e: Constant dripping wears away a stone.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑服↑↓ふく↓からしずくが↑垂↑↓しだ↓れていた。

words.gloss: lowering, sinking, bringing down, letting down
sauce (esp. soy or mirin-based dipping sauce)
